resources.string: If disabled, any previously granted signature spoofing permissions remain in place, but no longer have any effect

Allows applications to impersonate another application (known as "signature spoofing").

Legitimate applications include microG or Phonesky (Google Play Store for microG).

This option is a global ON/OFF setting, i.e. applications must explicitly request signature spoofing, or it must be manually enabled within each App's "Permission" screen (this permission can also be revoked there).
